body:
Hey guys, for those who are subscribers, hang in there!
I will be resuming my channel hopefully this weekend with an episode 3 of nebula and a skit thrown in too!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6qZ9vdryr7m-4sS0i9kL3Q
